Package addressbook

Class Summary
Address Class to store address details.
AddressBook This class stores and manipulates a set of Entry objects, each of which contains contact details for a single person.
Entry A class to maintain all of the information for a single entry in an AddressBook.
Person This class manages details about a single person
 

Exception Summary
BadRecordException Thrown to indicate that an individual record in an address book is malformed.
EntryExistsException Thrown when an attempt is made to add a duplicate entry into an address book.
FileFormatException Thrown to indicate that an address book file is invalid in some way.
NoSuchEntryException Thrown when an attempt is made to access a record that doesn't exist within an address book
